heading: fast cash
subheading: it was raining money in el paso when a mcdonald's manager drove off to the bank with the day's receipts on top of his pickup truck. drivers and pedestrians scrambled in his wake to grab as much cash as they could hold. one woman was quick enough to nab an entire deposit bag as she drove by. the manager realized his mistake in time to retrieve the other bag, but with only some of the money still left. police wouldn't say exactly how much money was lost, just that "it's a lot."
author: wired staff
text: it was raining money in el paso when a mcdonald's manager drove off to the bank with the day's receipts on top of his pickup truck. drivers and pedestrians scrambled in his wake to grab as much cash as they could hold. one woman was quick enough to nab an entire deposit bag as she drove by. the manager realized his mistake in time to retrieve the other bag, but with only some of the money still left. police wouldn't say exactly how much money was lost, just that "it's a lot."
